name: CurlWrap 1 Automatic Rotating Curling Iron with Longer Barrel
about: What it is:A one-inch automatic rotating curling iron with nine heat levels, two timer settings, and two rotation speeds for fast, easy styling and lasting curls and waves..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Curl-Enhancing.Key Benefits:- Automatic barrel rotation for easy styling and flawless results.What Else You Need to Know:T3 AutoTwist Technology powers a one-inch auto-rotating barrel to cut styling time and create perfect curls and waves. A two-way AutoTwist switch steers effortless barrel rotation and pairs with a SmartCurl timer to form consistent, long-lasting curls in seconds.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Start with dry, detangled hair. .-Section hair and choose the right heat setting for your hair type..-Insert the ends of a one-to-two-inch section into the clip. For best results, position hair in the upper half of the clip..-Slide the AutoTwist switch to the left or right to guide the barrel rotation toward or away from your face. .-Hold the switch until hair is fully wrapped around the barrel, then release the switch to activate the timer..-Hold the iron in place until the timer signals..-Then open the clamp and release the curl. .-Press the Home button to reset the barrel and start again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I usually use a wand but I am absolutely in love with this curler!! Itu2019s so easy to use and works so well and I love how it tells you when youu2019re done curling. I know this willlast me so long and be great! Offered by t3micro

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am shocked that they make hair tools this high-tech that are still beginner friendly! As someone with long hair who has never been able to curl their hair with a traditional wand, curler, I thought that I was stuck with straight hair forever. The only times Iu2019ve been able to accomplish beautifully curled hair has been when someone else has done it and even then it doesnu2019t hold a curl for long. There are so many features that make your hair curling experience customized to your needs. Reading the manual is critical so donu2019t skip thatu2019s There are two speeds to choose from. My hair is long so I like the lower speed to take my time getting the perfect wrap. There are also 9 heat settings and I usually donu2019t go higher than 6 to protect my hair. The higher the heat the tighter the curl Iu2019ve found. And lastly I usually have the timer set for five seconds to maintain equal heated curls, but you can go up to eight seconds or manually do it. I love that you can change the direction of the spin easily. Overall, this is the perfect tool for beginners or those who want an easy and customizable curling experience. This was gifted by t3hair. photo is right side curled Left side untouched.

T3 hair tools are always great additions to my hair routine. I always love how my hair looks curled and this tool makes it so easy. The self rotating feature is so cool and great for beginners. I get flawless curls that last as well quickly. The ceramic barrel leaves my hair smooth and not frizzy, especially with lower heat settings. Gifted by T3hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this curling iron. It has such a long barrel that works so well on my longer hair. It makes it so easy to curl my hair quickly. I would highly recommend this to anyone with long hair. It is super high quality as well. Gifted by T3 Micro.

reviews.review_title: Perfect, flawless curls made with ease
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received T3 curlwrap 1 complimentary from T3 micro and skeepers in exchange for my honest review. I am 39 years old with type 2A hair that are so silky that I have never been able to achieve nice and perfect curls. But thanks to T3 micro that I found a curler of my dreams. The best part of this hair tool is that it's so much easy to use. Automating curling iron makes it a lot easy to make curls for my long hair. There is also an auto twist switch that steers curls direction.Besides autotwist technology it has smart curl timer that tells you with a beep that job is done. 9 heat settings let you choose what you desire and want for your hair. I love its white and rose gold color which make it look so luxe. In short this T3 curls wrap is worth trying and valuable for given price as it let you achieve perfect flawless curls.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Talk about ergonomic hair tools! Itu2019s so nice to not have to try to awkwardly maneuver your hand and wrist in weird angles to get the perfect curl! I do think it works better for longer hair than shorter but I do appreciate how thereu2019s different speeds for the rolling mechanism! Gifted by T3 Hair for my honest opinion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m obsessed with this curler! I am someone who struggles with curling hair so the fact that this auto spins and makes life easier is amazing! It has a training mode which is great so you can get a feel for the technique you want to use and how to use. I also love the timer and the beep so you know how long your hair has been wrapped! Itu2019s an easy mindless process that makes curling my hair more enjoyable for sure! I love the different heat settings and how you can easily use the left or right trigger! Overall itu2019s amazing! So thankful to be gifted by t3hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little skeptical about this curler at first when it was gifted by t3hair , but itu2019s actually super user friendly and I loved the results! The timer setting on it is so nice, and I love how many heat settings it has! Would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by t3micro. I recently tried out the T3 CurlWrap 1u201d, and I have to say, Iu2019m seriously impressed. Itu2019s incredibly easy to use, thanks to the AutoTwist Technology that does most of the work for you. I just secured a section of my hair, pressed to wrap, and the barrel rotated automaticallyu2014talk about effortless! The curls I got were gorgeous and stayed in place all day. The 9 heat settings and 2 barrel rotation speeds let me customize the temperature and timing perfectly for my hair. Plus, the SmartCurl timer is a game-changer; it told me exactly when to release the curl, which took out all the guesswork. I also love how the negative ion generator tamed my frizz and added a beautiful shine to my hair. The curls came out smooth, defined, and frizz-free. Whether youu2019re a pro or a beginner, this tool makes achieving perfect curls a breeze. If youu2019re looking for a reliable curling iron that delivers stunning results with minimal effort, the T3 CurlWrap 1u201d is definitely worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who is bad at styling my hair, this tool makes it so easy! All I have to do is clamp my hair, and the tool does the rest. Itu2019s very high tech and even has different heat settings, and a home button to rotate back to center. Iu2019m obsessed! Gifted by t3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If youu2019re a beginner to doing your hair or suck at curling it, you need the curl wrap! This is as simple as it can get when it comes to curling your own hair. Thereu2019s even different heating settings to ensure you donu2019t burn off your hair. I gifted by t3 in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_title: I Love The Auto Rotate Feature
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This T3 CurlWrap 1 is definitely an upgrade from any curler I've tried in the past. It's so fancy with the golden accents and the auto rotate feature. With that feature I don't have to worry about burning myself. My perfect setting is 6 out of the 9 dots. 390u00b0F is when the hair starts to burn so six dots at 370u00b0F is perfect below that heat. I do the slowest speed setting out of the two, and 5 seconds instead of 8 seconds for how long I curl it. I love the innovative technology and I love that this was gifted to me by T3 micro for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Here's an expanded and different version of your review:  ---  Iu2019m absolutely in love with this curling iron! The quality is outstanding, and it feels solid and well-made in my hands. It heats up quickly and the temperature controls are easy to adjust, making it a breeze to use. My curls come out perfectly every time, and they last all day without any touch-ups. It's clear that a lot of thought went into designing this tool, from the ergonomic handle to the smooth glide through my hair. This curling iron has truly elevated my hairstyling routine, and I can confidently say itu2019s worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This helped me curl my hair easily! I have long hair so it can be tough to get everything. This being automatic is a game changer for me. I have been doing my hair 3 times a week using this where before I only did once a month! Gifted by t3hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how this feels so high tech. Iu2019m actually really impressed with how easily it made getting a curl. The curls look beautiful and I like that I can adjust the tightness when twirling it. The settings are very intuitive and I also enjoyed the little sounds they make, also appreciate the settings based on your hair texture. Afterwards, my hair is looking shinier and so pretty with curls. Gifted by t3hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with long, naturally wavy hair, Iu2019ve experimented with countless curling irons, but the T3 CurlWrap 1u201d has genuinely set itself apart. This curling iron delivers exactly what it promisesu2014sleek, frizz-free, and beautifully defined curlsu2014all in a single pass. Yes, just one.  The standout feature here is the T3 AutoTwist Technology. The automatic rotating barrel takes the hassle out of curling, wrapping your hair effortlessly and evenly. Itu2019s like having an expert stylist guiding your hand, without the need for any complex maneuvers.  Letu2019s dive into the heat settingsu2014there are nine options to choose from. Whether you have thick or fine hair, you can easily find the perfect temperature that works for you. The Digital T3 SinglePassu00ae Technology ensures that the heat is evenly applied, which is why achieving flawless curls in one go is entirely possible. For someone like me, whou2019s always struggled to get my waves to hold, this was a true revelation.  The ion generator is another feature that deserves mention. It left my curls looking glossy and smooth, while effectively taming any frizz. After styling with the T3 CurlWrap, my hair had a polished, salon-finished look that I absolutely loved.  Customization is key with this tool. The SmartCurl timer and adjustable rotation speeds allow you to craft your curls exactly how you want them. Whether youu2019re aiming for loose, beachy waves or tighter, more defined curls, the T3 CurlWrap adapts to your styling needs.  Design-wise, the extended CeraGlossu2122 ceramic barrel is perfect for long hair. It lets you curl larger sections at once, making the entire process quicker and more efficient.  In my opinion, the T3 CurlWrap 1u201d is an essential addition to any hair routine. Its advanced technology and ease of use make it a top-tier tool for achieving professional-looking curls at home. If youu2019re after stunning curls without the usual effort, this curling iron is a fantastic investment.

reviews.review_title: The best curling tool I have tried
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m impressed with the T3 Micro CurlWrap 1. It effortlessly curled my straight hair, which can be a challenge with some tools. What really stood out was how long the curls lasted. Even after a full day, they held up beautifully without losing their shape or bounce. The curling process itself was straightforward, with the barrel heating up quickly and evenly, ensuring consistent results. The toolu2019s design also makes it easy to use, allowing for smooth wrapping of hair around the barrel without any tugging or discomfort. Whether youu2019re looking for loose waves or tight curls, the T3 CurlWrap delivers excellent results. Itu2019s become a must-have in my styling routine! Gifted by t3hair

I also love the built-in timer, which makes it effortless to track the perfect curl time. This curler is fantastic! I was so generously gifted by t3hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s a good curler but it does need some time to getting used to. I normally use a wand without the clipper, so for me it was a struggle at first. Also the twisting thing definitely need some getting used to. I didnu2019t like that the ends where I would clip my hair would turn out crinkled, like a sharp wrinkle at the end, (not sure how to explain it correctly, see close up photo) until I figured out a way to release some hair and move it once the rest of the hair was wrapped around the barrel so I wouldnu2019t have that awkward sharp wrinkle at the end. Also I didnu2019t realize that I was curling my hair the wrong way at on one side until I finished and saw it wasnu2019t away from face. I do love the feature where it alerts you that the curl is done, and how quickly it heats up and it has the different heat options. I will have to practice more to get a hang of it. I did like the way my loose waves turned out. Gifted by T3 Micro.

Additionally, unlike its rivals, this model's clamp doesn't leave a crimp. Very simple to use, and it doesn't seem to harm my hair in any way. I was gifted by t3

reviews.review_text: The T3 Curlwrap 1 is an innovative tool for hair styling. It gave me beautiful, long-lasting curls and was super easy to use. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I never really curl my hair because Iu2019ve always found the tools difficult to use, but because of this iu2019m going to start curling my hair more often! I love the sleek look, and the fact that it is so easy to use and basically curls your hair for you. It has different heat modes and timers that make it so easy to use, and the curls lasts me days. This product was gifted by T3 in exchange for an honest review.

Iu2019ve finally tried the Curlwrap 1u201d gifted by T3 and I am obsessed with how easy it was to use! I love that my curls turn out perfect every time and it cuts my hair styling time in half! The Curlwrap is definitely a game changer especially for people with plenty of hair because it can take over 30 minutes to curl with a regular curling iron!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m fairly new to curling my hair and this wand made it so easy for me to get salon level styled hair. Love the fact that it has alarm kind notification to let you know when to release the curl. This doesnu2019t burn your hair to crisp. It gives such amazing bouncy curls. Gifted by T3hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited for this curling iron! First off itu2019s stunning! Such a pretty color as all other tools from t3! Itu2019s super easy to use! I was able to curl my hair with it within 30 mins or less! I love that it beeps when your hair is done curling! This was gifted by t3hair! Thank you!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by t3hair! Iu2019ve been on the hunt for a curling tool that gives me those effortless waves without the hassle, and the T3 CurlWrap 1u201d delivered. It heats up quickly and the ceramic barrel ensures smooth, frizz-free curls that last all day. I love that itu2019s super easy to useu2014even on my stubborn hair, which usually struggles to hold a curl. Plus, the adjustable heat settings make it versatile for different hair types. If youu2019re looking for defined curls or soft waves, this is definitely a winner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, letu2019s just talk about how this product looks. Have you ever seen a more beautiful curling iron it looks so expensive and so beautiful on top of that I love how itu2019s a ceramic base I feel like itu2019s a lot more gentle on my hair and my hair doesnu2019t get as hot when Iu2019m curling my hair. I love how this tool rotates to make it a lot easier because I have very long hair and itu2019s a lot of arm movements if I have to like wrap it myself, because the heat is so evenly spread on this curling iron. The curl holds forever so when I do it in the morning, I can come home and it looks almost exactly like it did when I left. Offered by t3micro

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by t3 for an honest review! My hair is extremely long and wonu2019t hold a curl usually but this gave my hair the prettiest curls that lasted even without hair spray! And it was so easy to use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly was a little hesitant before trying this product out but can confident say this curler is so good and so convenient to have! Iu2019ve never truly mastered a traditional curler, but this does literally the work for you and gives such a flawless curl. I love how hot the temperature can go but also how the curler works with you to determine the proper heat. I was gifted by t3 micro.
